Properties.Data:
name: test-component
schemaVersion: "1.0"
phases:
  - name: build
    steps:
      - name: hello-world-build
        action: ExecuteBash
        onFailure: Continue
        timeoutSeconds: 720
        inputs:
          commands:
            - echo "Hello build!"
  - name: validate
    steps:
      - name: hello-world-validate
        action: ExecuteBash
        inputs:
          commands:
            - echo "Hello validate!"
  - name: test
    steps:
      - name: hello-world-test
        action: ExecuteBash
        inputs:
          commands:
            - echo "Hello test!"
Properties.Name: aws-cdk-imagebuilder-component-all-parameters-inline-component

BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
